snippet: As Paul Taylor celebrates his company’s 60th anniversary, he announces a plan to keep it going on for at least “another 60 years” by establishing a center for American modern dance.
abstract: Choreographer Paul Taylor wants his dance company, which is celebrating its 60th anniversary, to continue after his death and to broaden its mission to include past masterworks of modern dance; also plans to create 'new center for American modern dance.'
lead_paragraph: As Paul Taylor celebrates his company’s 60th anniversary, he announces a plan to keep it going on for at least “another 60 years” by establishing a center for American modern dance.

headline.main: Legacy in Mind, Taylor Plans a Center for Modern Dance
headline.print_headline: Legacy in Mind, Taylor Plans a Center for Modern Dance
